sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import styles from "../pages.module.css" const Epk = () => { return (

Sofia and the Spectrum began as a joke.



“If I fronted a band, I’d call it Sofia and the Spectrum”, said Sofia, because she’s on the spectrum. Everyone laughed. She laughed.



And then she thought a little harder about it.



Sofia and the Spectrum is, above all, music for people who think too hard about things. It’s what happens when a steady diet of confessional singer-songwriter pop lyricism meets a lifelong fascination with the blues and its relatives. Every song is full of visceral, theatrical intensity, the product of ruminating too long over every little thought and emotion, paper and pen in hand, and the band behind it only adds to that intensity. Freewheeling through the decades from classic blues to rock and roll to modern blues rock, the band’s sound is dynamic, infectious, and big.



Introducing...

  • Sofia on vocals


  • Jake on guitar


  • Cat on bass


  • Luke on drums


  • Viv on trumpet






); }; export default Epk
